nodes.name: Complete Register Mail Sent Tag Request
Complete Register Mail Template Send Request
Send whatsapp followup for the user
Complete Register WhatsApp Sent Tag Request
User Step If it is none after 24 hours
Complete Register Mail Sent Tag and Complete Register WhatsApp Sent removal
If user target audience and not a never married
User Step If check is empty

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "user_id": "{{ $('User Step If check is empty').item.json.zm_id }}",
  "comment_text": "#robot #incomplete_registration Call & follow-up required.",
  "is_todo":true,
  "priority":"low",
  "type": "incomplete_registration"
}

nodes.name: Create comment to follow up for CRM

parameters.jsonBody: ={"user_id": "{{ $json.body.payload.sender_id }}"}

={"email_template": "vm_accepted_user_follow_up_email",
  "send_push_notification": true,
    "user_id": "{{ $('Send Immediately').item.json.body.payload.receiver_id }}",
  "title": "ðŸŽ‰ Itâ€™s a Yes! {{ $json.name }} is ready to meet",
  "cta_text": "Schedule Virtual Meet",
  "message":"{{ $json.name }} has accepted your virtual meet request. Share your availability to schedule the call.",
  "redirect_url":"view-profile/{{ $json.zm_id }}",
  "notification_type":"n8n_accepted_vm_push",
  "other_user_id":"{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.sender_id }}"
}

={"user_id": "{{ $('Send Immediately').item.json.body.payload.receiver_id }}",
"template_name":"virtual_meet_request_accepted",
"other_user_id" : "{{ $('Send Immediately').item.json.body.payload.sender_id }}"
}

parameters.content: Once User Scheduled. Add the event to calender

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "email_template": "vm_post_successfull_follow_up_email",
  "send_push_notification": true,
  "user_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.user_1_id }}",
  "virtual_meet_id": {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }},
  "title": "Hope your virtual meet went well ðŸŽ‰",
  "cta_text": "Rate & Help Others",
  "message":"Take a moment to share your experience and help others on their journey.",
   "redirect_url":"meet_link_schedule/{{ $json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }}",
  "notification_type":"n8n_post_vm_feedback_push"
}

nodes.name: Post VM Feedback Followup Email and push notification(User 1)

parameters.jsonBody:
={
  "email_template": "vm_post_successfull_follow_up_email",
  "send_push_notification": true,
  "user_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.user_2_id }}",
  "virtual_meet_id": {{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }},
  "title": "Hope your virtual meet went well ðŸŽ‰",
  "cta_text": "Rate & Help Others",
  "message":"Take a moment to share your experience and help others on their journey.",
  "redirect_url":"meet_link_schedule/{{ $json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }}",
  "notification_type":"n8n_post_vm_feedback_push"
}

nodes.name: Post VM Feedback Followup Email and Push Notification(User 2)

parameters.jsonBody:
={"user_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.user_2_id }}",
"template_name":"virtual_meet_post_scheduled",
"virtual_meet_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }}"
}

={"user_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.user_1_id }}",
"template_name":"virtual_meet_post_scheduled",
"virtual_meet_id": "{{ $('Webhook').item.json.body.payload.virtual_meet_id }}"
}

parameters.content: Once User Successfully had the meet. Triggering this event.
